summary: An email sent on August 10, 2019, describing a visit with inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on Thursday, August 8, 2019. The writer reports Epstein's mood, requests, and denial of suicidal thoughts, just two days before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate visited in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. He was meeting with attorneys, made various requests, and denied any suicidal thoughts or mental health concerns.

events.title: Visit with Epstein in SHU
events.description: The writer visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). Epstein was preparing to meet with his attorneys, made several requests (e.g., move to general population, social calls without speaker phone, retrieve a book), and denied any suicidal thoughts or mental health concerns.

events.title: Email sent regarding Epstein visit
events.description: An email was sent summarizing the visit with Jeffrey Epstein that occurred on August 8, 2019, describing his condition and requests.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (implied location of SHU/Special Housing Unit)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was visited in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on Thursday, August 8, 2019, two days before his death.
Epstein denied any suicidal thoughts, intentions, or mental health concerns during the visit.
Epstein had a cell mate at the time of the visit, with whom he was seen interacting.
Epstein made specific requests, including moving to general population, social calls without a speaker phone, and retrieving a book left in the suicide watch area.
The document is an email sent on August 10, 2019, documenting the visit and Epstein's state shortly before his death.
